title: Tridents
content:
u cannot be forced to drop the trident. When thrown, the weapon creates an explosion that deals 3-12 Thunder Damage in a 6m blast centered on the target.

Veil of the Wind: You gain a +3m bonus to movement speed and jump distance. Equipping this weapon gives you Immunity to falling damage.

Nyrulna: Glowing: This object shines with a glowing light in a radius of 6m.

Rush AttackPiercing StrikeCrippling Strike
